doc:
Sam Behrens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Behrens 0 Sam Behrens (born July 24, 1950) is an American television actor, best known for his roles as Jake Meyer on the ABC daytime soap opera General Hospital, Danny Waleska in the CBS prime time soap opera Knots Landing and as Gregory Richards in the NBC daytime soap opera, Sunset Beach. He is of German ancestry on his paternal side. Sam_Behrens ( born July_24_,_1950 ) is an_American_television_actor , best_known for his_roles as Jake_Meyer on the_ABC_daytime_soap_opera_General_Hospital , Danny_Waleska in the_CBS_prime_time_soap_opera_Knots_Landing and as Gregory_Richards in the_NBC_daytime_soap_opera , Sunset_Beach . He is of German_ancestry on his_paternal_side .
